none: Chicago, Burlington & Quincy Railroad Company Menu, Aboard the Denver Zephyr, 1962
2 p. ; 31 cm x 46 cm, folded to 31 cm
Ira Silverman Railroad Menu Collection--Series 10. Chicago, Burlington & Quincy Railroad Company--Sub-Series 1. Menus

Items on menu: Appetizers; Soup; Dinner; Sandwiches; Vegetables; Salads; Dessert; Beverage list ; Meals served: Dinner. Representative dishes: Chef's Suggestion: Irish Stew en Casserole, Demi Tossed Salad or Peas in Butter, Hot rolls, Pineapple Sundae with Wafers, Coffee or Tea or Milk ($2.65). Broiler Special: Broiled Sirloin Steak (12 oz.), Button Mushrooms, French Fried Potatoes, Bon Ton Salad (Choice of Dressing), Hot Rolls, Coffee or Tea or Milk ($4.50)

The images on this web site are from material in the collections of the Transportation Library of Northwestern University Libraries, are provided for use by its students, faculty and staff, and by other researchers visiting this site, for research consultation and scholarly purposes only. Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections API
Homepage at Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections

The Ira Silverman Railroad Menu Collection consists of 238 items: 227 menus and eleven pamphlets. 35 United States and Canadian railroads are represented in the collection. All menus were issued by their respective railroad.
